review_content:
I love Kat Von D products, in particular for the gorgeous goth like packaging. This blush does not disappoint in presentation- the package is adorable. The blush formulation itself is a blendable texture and a flattering shade. My only issue is it lacks staying power but I am comparing it to Tom Ford and Natasha Denona, my daily drivers. I normally do not need to reapply blush but with Kat Von D I did see a noticeable fading through the day.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Honeysuckle is my new fav blush
review_content: Love this blush. Super pigmented, not too much kick-up in the pan. “Honeysuckle” is a beautiful muted pink-coral on my light-neutral skin tone. Apply in the morning and it lasts all day. Also the packaging is lovely although it doesn’t come with a mirror if that is important to you (doesn’t bother me with a blush). I gave 4/5 stars instead of 5/5 because of the price; I find $35 Canadian a bit high.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I haven’t worn blush in years but fell in love with this one right away. Foxglove blended in with my skin super easily and you could build it up if you wanted to. It also stayed on all day

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
The packaging has a very pretty petal design, in a matte black. It's lightweight so it feels a bit cheap but to be honest it doesn't bother me at all. It says to "kiss" the blush with your brush because it's pigmented - IT IS NOT LYING. You can quite easily go overboard. Now if that's your vibe, rock it. The foxglove shade is defined as a dusty rose which is one of my absolute favourite blush colours. It's a natural flush of colour which suits many skin tones (I'm fair/light with freckles). It will last you a very long time because of the strong pigmentation. Beware there is a lot of kickback in the pan. I will be rocking this a lot!

And this was the one product that definitely did not disappoint. The shade of blush is absolutely stunning. The matte finish is perfect, and it’s been my every day blush for well over a month now. This is definitely a buildable blush as well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for that perfect dusty rose shade!

Received this lip gloss as complimentary from @influensterca @kvdveganbeauty part of the #mytrueportrait #contest. This is a beautiful blush. Not only is the colour gorgeous, it's very pigmented on so you don't need as much but if you want it brighter you certainly put more on! It's easy to apply and easy to stick! The blush lasted all day without reapplying. It's lovely! Very light feeling you won't notice it!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I got this blush from influenster for testing. I haven't been been much lucky with blushes but when I tried this one I fell in love with it instantly. The color is so beautiful and compliments my skintone very well. It is a dusty rose color that will look good on any skintone. It is very highly pigmented and applies beautifully with a brush. I would definitely recommend this blush and the color to anyone.
